actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend section 21A of the Federal Home Loan Bank Act to establish additional procedures and requirements relating to the identification and disposition of environmentally sensitive land and other property with natural, cultural, recreational, or scientific values of special significance by the Resolution Trust Corporation.
short_title: Resolution Trust Corporation Asset Disposition Act

summary.text: Resolution Trust Corporation Asset Disposition Act - Amends the Federal Home Loan Bank Act to direct the Resolution Trust Corporation (RTC) to designate in its inventory of real property assets any properties identified by the Secretary of the Interior as having special natural cultural, scientific, or recreational significance. Requires the Secretary to review such inventory and list the properties so designated in the Federal Register. Restricts the Corporation's power to dispose of properties so designated. Prescribes guidelines under which the RTC may transfer such designated properties to qualified land stewards (i.e., certain governmental or nonprofit organizations) for long-term preservation or use consistent with their special significance.

titles.title: Resolution Trust Corporation Asset Disposition Act

A bill to amend section 21A of the Federal Home Loan Bank Act to establish additional procedures and requirements relating to the identification and disposition of environmentally sensitive land and other property with natural, cultural, recreational, or scientific values of special significance by the Resolution Trust Corporation.
